definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Na 3:16 a kind of locust, abs. [[יֶלֶק]] Na 3:16 + 5 t.; [[יׇ֑לֶק]] Joe 1:4 + 2 t.;—alw. coll.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as devouring ‖[[גׇּזׇם]], [[אַרְבֶּה]], [[חָסִיל]], Joe 1:4, Joe 1:4, Joe 2:25; ‖[[אַרְבֶּה]] Ps 105:34 (of Egyptian plague), cf. Na 3:15 a (but del. We).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in sim. of multitude of men Na 3:15 b, Je 51:14; of horses v:Je 51:27 ([[יֶלֶק סָמָר]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in sim. of scattering and disappearing Na 3:16.
